title: All-Party Parliamentary Group for Food and Drink
purpose: To debate the policy priorities and issues related to the UKâ€™s largest manufacturing sector, the food and drink sector. The group will aim to promote dialogue and discussion between industry and politicians through a series of policy roundtables, events and site visits.
